title: Business Analyst
description:
Skills:
Statistical Analysis, Machine Learning, Python Programming, Data Visualization, Predictive Modeling, Big Data, SQL, Data Mining,

We are seeking a highly skilled and detail-oriented Business Analyst to join our team. The ideal candidate will possess a blend of technical knowledge, business acumen, and communication skills, enabling them to analyze and improve business processes, collaborate with stakeholders, and ensure that our solutions meet business needs.

Key Responsibilities


Requirements Gathering & Analysis:
Collaborate with stakeholders to gather business requirements, define project scope, and identify functional/non-functional requirements.
Create clear and concise Business Requirements Documents (BRD) and Software Requirements Specifications (SRS).
Conduct workshops, interviews, and surveys to ensure comprehensive understanding of business needs.
Documentation & Process Mapping:
Develop and maintain detailed documentation such as BRD, SRS, user stories, and use cases.
Create process maps, workflows, and diagrams to visually represent business processes and system interactions.
Ensure proper traceability of requirements throughout the project lifecycle.
Wireframing & UI/UX Collaboration:
Collaborate with UX/UI designers to create wireframes and mockups to visually communicate the design and functionality of proposed solutions.
Create low-fidelity and high-fidelity wireframes to illustrate user flows and application design.
Assist in the development of functional specifications and user acceptance criteria based on wireframes.
Agile Methodology & Tools:
Work within an Agile environment, facilitating sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and retrospective meetings.
Manage user stories, backlogs, and tasks within Jira, ensuring that they are well defined, prioritized, and tracked throughout the development process.
Assist in the development of test cases and support user acceptance testing (UAT).


Skills And Qualifications


Technical Skills:
Proficient in Jira for managing tasks, user stories, and project backlogs.
Knowledge of creating and maintaining BRD and SRS documentation.
Experience with wireframing tools (e.g., Balsamiq, Figma, Axure, Sketch).
Familiarity with Agile methodologies, Scrum, and Sprint management.
Business Analysis Skills:
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Experience in process mapping and requirements analysis.
Ability to translate business needs into technical specifications and solutions.
Strong understanding of software development lifecycle (SDLC).
Experience in conducting gap analysis, impact analysis, and risk assessments.
Communication & Collaboration:
Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
Ability to effectively interact with stakeholders, technical teams, and vendors.
Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to build relationships and influence decision-makers.
Other Skills:
Experience with project management tools (e.g., Confluence, Trello).
Strong attention to detail and ability to document complex information in a clear, structured manner.
Knowledge of data analysis and visualization tools is a plus (e.g., Excel, Power BI).
